div.p: This page provides a list of the FHIR artifacts defined as part of this implementation guide.
{% capture grouping_desc %}These define constraints on FHIR resources for systems conforming to this implementation guide.{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}

tr.td: {% capture desc %}This profile is used to track the allergies and intolerances of a patient based on a given value set.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}A Care Plan tailored to the needs of CARA with advanced directives{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}The care team is comprised of the patient, his legal representatives, healthcare professionals contributing to his shared care plan and externals.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}A condition is used too describe the clinical status and diagnosis made to a patient.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}The purpose of a Goal is to track a topic around the Shared Care Plan with its associated list of goals.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}An observation is used to track the status of the patient on a given goal.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}This profile is used to add organizations to a care team.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}This profile extension is used to ensure the fields of the master patient index are properly used throughout the implementation.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}This profile is used to add externals to a care team.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

div.p: {% capture grouping_desc %}These define constraints on FHIR data types for systems conforming to this implementation guide.{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}

tr.td: {% capture desc %}The anticipate directives are in the EHR of the patient. This field is present and is a boolean{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}This field is used to indicate where the advance directives are if they exist and are not located in the EHR.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}Attention Point on the observation{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}This field is used to render the country of birth of the patient{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}This field is used to indicate whether a patient has advanced directives{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}Used to describe the historical background of a patient affiliated to CARA{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}Used to describe the priorities of a patient with regard to his SCP{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

td.a: Show note in SCP monitoring screen

tr.td: {% capture desc %}Notes are by default not shown in the SCP monitoring screen. However a member of the SCP interprofessional team can choose to disclose it to the rest of the team.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}Used to describe the social background of a patient affiliated to CARA{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
